member.name: ID2D1BoundsAdjustmentTransform.GetOutputBounds
member.summary: Returns the output rectangle of the support transform.

member.name: ID2D1BoundsAdjustmentTransform.SetOutputBounds
member.summary: This sets the output bounds for the support transform.

member.name: ID2D1BoundsAdjustmentTransform
member.summary: A support transform for effects to modify the output rectangle of the previous effect or bitmap.
